data.title: War Machine. I wrote this today 7/14/24 in the spirit of #WoodyGuthrie and aftermath of yesterday’s events. Violence ain’t an answer,...
data.meta_description:
26 likes, 2 comments - jareddeckmusic on July 14, 2024: "War Machine. I wrote this today 7/14/24 in the spirit of #WoodyGuthrie and aftermath of yesterday’s events. Violence ain’t an answer, y’all. Full video link in bio: https://youtu.be/YVh1LROwC14 

Well there’s violence among us
We cannot ignore
There’s blood on our hands
In this online war
So get off your phone 
Before somebody believes your bullshit is for real

When war’s a machine
There’s a price and a cost
There’s dollars on the floor
And a mind half cocked
See the intelligence is artificial 
When a buck can be made in the name of freedom and of faith

This machine kills fascists
Cause it cannot be bought
It can’t be purchased 
And it can’t be fought
It’s just a metaphysical metaphor
For fighting a war with art

If we’re to remain
With peace in our land
We gotta love our neighbor 
More than propagand
Because war ain’t civil
And quite honestly I’d prefer to survive

If you love this country
Would you please love me
Cause we all live here
And we wanna die free 
So find value in our differences and fight for something more than belief 

Please fight for our differences
I’ll fight for you if you’ll fight for me

#woodyfest #protestsong #folksong #folkmusic #propaganda #peace #nonviolence #fightforyouandme #thisfightwasmadeforyouandme". violence, online world, freedom, faith, artificial intelligence
